INSERT INTO ORDERMAINMOBILETEMP ( OMMT_SEQ, OMMT_NUM, OMMT_PGTID, OMMT_OWNERID, OMMT_OWNERNAME, OMMT_ACCOUNTMONEY, OMMT_COUPONMONEY, OMMT_SAVEMONEY, OMMT_CARDMONEY, OMMT_LATERMONEY, INSERT INTO ORDERADDRESSMOBILETEMP ( OAMT_SEQ, OAMT_OMNUM, OAMT_OSSERIAL, OAMT_NAME, OAMT_ADDR1, OAMT_ADDR2, OAMT_ADDR3, OAMT_COUNTRYCODE, OAMT_COUNTRYNAME, OAMT_ZIPCODE, OAMT_TEL, OAMT_FAX, OAMT_PHONE, OAMT_EMAIL, OAMT_LEVEL, OAMT_TYPE, OAMT_USE, OAMT_MOID, OAMT_INID, OAMT_MODATE, OAMT_INDATE, OAMT_DELINAME, OAMT_DELIMEMO, OAMT_ORDERERTEL, OAMT_ORDEREREMAIL, OAMT_ZONECODE, OAMT_BUYERNAME, OAMT_BUYERPHONE, OAMT_BUYEREMAIL, OAMT_BUYERCOUNTRYCODE, OAMT_BUYERCOUNTRYNAME ) VALUES ( orderaddress_seq.nextval, #{oaOmNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaOsSerial, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TRIM(#{oaName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{oaAddr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaAddr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaAddr3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaCountryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaCountryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaZipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIM(#{oaPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), TRIM(#{oaEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{oaLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaUse, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaMoId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaInId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{oaDeliName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaDeliMemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIM(#{oaOrderErTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), TRIM(#{oaOrderErEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{oaZoneCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIM(#{oaBuyerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), TRIM(#{oaBuyerPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), TRIM(#{oaBuyerEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{oaBuyerCountryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaBuyerCountryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO KFO_MEMBER_ADDRESS_TEMP (ID, OMNUM, USERID, NAME, ADDR1, ADDR2, ADDR3, ZONECODE, PHONE, EMAIL, DEFAULTADDRESSTYPE, COUNTRYCODE, UPD_USER, REG_USER, UPD_DTTM, REG_DTTM) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBERADDRESS_ID.nextval, #{omNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zoneCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultAddressType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )

mapper.select: SELECT OMMT_SEQ, OMMT_NUM, OMMT_PGTID, OMMT_OWNERID, OMMT_OWNERNAME, OMMT_ACCOUNTMONEY, OMMT_COUPONMONEY, OMMT_SAVEMONEY, OMMT_CARDMONEY, OMMT_LATERMONEY, OMMT_VIRTUALACCOUNTMONEY, OMMT_ORIGINALMONEY, OMMT_SALEMONEY, OMMT_NEWSAVEMONEY, OMMT_DELIVERYMONEY, OMMT_STATUS, OMMT_ACTIVESTATUS, OMMT_ETC1, OMMT_ETC2, OMMT_ETC3, OMMT_ETC4, OMMT_ETC5, OMMT_ETC6, OMMT_LEVEL, OMMT_TYPE, OMMT_USE, OMMT_CPPAYTYPE, OMMT_ESCROWUSE, OMMT_ESCROWSTATUS, OMMT_DEPOSITACCOUNT, OMMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTBANK, OMMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTNAME, OMMT_REFUNDACCOUNT, OMMT_REFUNDACCOUNTBANK, OMMT_REFUNDACCOUNTNAME, OMMT_DELITYPE, OMMT_DELIPAYTYPE, OMMT_DELIMOENYUSE, OMMT_DELIMEMO, OMMT_DELINUM, OMMT_DELIBOXEA, OMMT_PCCSEQ, OMMT_ACCESSTYPE, OMMT_DELIINOUTTYPE, OMMT_CARDTYPE, OMMT_MOID, OMMT_INID, OMMT_MODATE, OMMT_INDATE, OMMT_POINTMONEY, OMMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTINNAME, OMMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTINDATE, OMMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTINTIME, OMMT_CREDITCARDNUM, OMMT_CREDITCARDCODE, OMMT_ACCOUNTBANKCODE, OMMT_PAYTYPE, OMMT_ACTADMINID, OMMT_GIFTPRCODE, OMMT_GIFTPRNAME, OMMT_GIFTPRNAME1, OMMT_GIFTPRNAME2, OMMT_KAKAOMONEY, OMMT_PHONEMONEY, OMMT_COUPON, OMMT_PHONENUM FROM ORDERMAINMOBILETEMP WHERE OMMT_NUM = #{oId}

SELECT OAMT_SEQ, OAMT_OMNUM, OAMT_OSSERIAL, OAMT_NAME, OAMT_ADDR1, OAMT_ADDR2, OAMT_ADDR3, OAMT_ZIPCODE, OAMT_TEL, OAMT_FAX, OAMT_PHONE, OAMT_EMAIL, OAMT_LEVEL, OAMT_TYPE, OAMT_USE, OAMT_MOID, OAMT_INID, OAMT_MODATE, OAMT_INDATE, OAMT_DELINAME, OAMT_DELIMEMO, OAMT_ORDERERTEL, OAMT_ORDEREREMAIL, OAMT_ZONECODE, OAMT_COUNTRYCODE, OAMT_COUNTRYNAME, OAMT_BUYERNAME, OAMT_BUYEREMAIL, OAMT_BUYERPHONE, OAMT_BUYERCOUNTRYCODE, OAMT_BUYERCOUNTRYNAME, OAMT_ADDRESSTYPE FROM ORDERADDRESSMOBILETEMP WHERE OAMT_OMNUM = #{oId}

SELECT OSMT_SEQ, OSMT_OMNUM, OSMT_SERIAL, OSMT_PGTID, OSMT_PRCODE, OSMT_SCPCODE, OSMT_BCPCODE, OSMT_BDPCODE, OSMT_OWNERID, OSMT_OWNERNAME, OSMT_ACCOUNTMONEY, OSMT_CARDMONEY, OSMT_COUPONMONEY, OSMT_LATERMONEY, OSMT_BUDGETMONEY, OSMT_SAVEMONEY, OSMT_POINTMONEY, OSMT_VIRTUALACCOUNTMONEY, OSMT_SAVEMONEYPERCENTAGE, OSMT_NEWSAVEMONEY, OSMT_NEWPRSAVEMONEY, OSMT_ORIGINALMONEY, OSMT_SALEMONEY, OSMT_TOTORIGINALMONEY, OSMT_TOTSALEMONEY, OSMT_EA, OSMT_OUTEA, OSMT_INEA, OSMT_BGISEQ, OSMT_RELEASENUM, OSMT_OPTIONNAME, OSMT_MEMO, OSMT_REFUNDACCOUNT, OSMT_REFUNDACCOUNTBANK, OSMT_REFUNDACCOUNTNAME, OSMT_REFUNDSTATUS, OSMT_CPPAYTYPE, OSMT_VATUSE, OSMT_ESCROWUSE, OSMT_PARTCANCELUSE, OSMT_BUYCALCULATE, OSMT_SUPPLYCALCULATE, OSMT_DELITYPE, OSMT_DELIPAYTYPE, OSMT_DELIMOENYUSE, OSMT_DELIMEMO, OSMT_DELINUM, OSMT_DELIBOXEA, OSMT_PCCSEQ, OSMT_STATUS, OSMT_ETC1, OSMT_ETC2, OSMT_ETC3, OSMT_ETC4, OSMT_ETC5, OSMT_ETC6, OSMT_LEVEL, OSMT_TYPE, OSMT_USE, OSMT_MOID, OSMT_INID, OSMT_MODATE, OSMT_INDATE, OSMT_DEPOSITACCOUNT, OSMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTBANK, OSMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTNAME, OSMT_ACCESSTYPE, OSMT_MINUSACCOUNTMONEY, OSMT_MINUSCARDMONEY, OSMT_MINUSCOUPONMONEY, OSMT_MINUSLATERMONEY, OSMT_MINUSBUDGETMONEY, OSMT_MINUSSAVEMONEY, OSMT_MINUSPOINTMONEY, OSMT_MINUSVIRTUALACCOUNTMONEY, OSMT_DELIINOUTTYPE, OSMT_CARDTYPE, OSMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTINNAME, OSMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTINDATE, OSMT_DEPOSITACCOUNTINTIME, OSMT_PARENTPRCODE, OSMT_CTSEQ, OSMT_CANCELREASON, OSMT_ACTADMINID, OSMT_KAKAOMONEY, OSMT_PHONEMONEY, OSMT_ETC7 FROM ORDERSUBMOBILETEMP WHERE OSMT_OMNUM = #{oId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERMAINMOBILETEMP SET OMMT_PGTID = #{tId} WHERE OMMT_NUM = #{oId} AND OMMT_OWNERID = #{ownerId}
UPDATE ORDERSUBMOBILETEMP SET OSMT_PGTID = #{tId} WHERE OSMT_OMNUM = #{oId} AND OSMT_OWNERID = #{ownerId}

UPDATE ORDERMAINMOBILETEMP SET OMMT_ETC2 = #{orderMainMobileTemp.ommtEtc2}, OMMT_ETC3 = #{orderMainMobileTemp.ommtEtc3},
OMMT_CREDITCARDNUM = #{orderMainMobileTemp.ommtCreditcardnum},
OMMT_CREDITCARDCODE = #{orderMainMobileTemp.ommtCreditcardcode},
OMMT_ACCOUNTBANKCODE = #{orderMainMobileTemp.ommtAccountbankcode},
OMMT_MODATE = SYSDATE WHERE OMMT_NUM = #{orderMainMobileTemp.ommtNum} AND OMMT_OWNERID = #{orderMainMobileTemp.ommtOwnerid}
